statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, delivery_time, pricing_agreement FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_suppliers FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE delivery_time < 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE delivery_time < 10 AND pricing_agreement >= 100 ORDER BY quality_rating ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, delivery_time, pricing_agreement FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE quality_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.5 ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE pricing_agreement < 50 OR quality_rating > 3.5 ORDER BY pricing_agreement ASC, quality_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, pricing_agreement FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE delivery_time > 5 AND pricing_agreement <= 150 ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, delivery_time FROM supplier_metrics WHERE price_agreement > 0.5;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, delivery_time, price_agreement FROM supplier_metrics ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, overall_rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, delivery_time, price_agreement FROM supplier_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 3.5 ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY delivery_time DESC
SELECT supplier_id, delivery_time FROM supplier_metrics WHERE price_agreement < 0.5 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, delivery_time, price_agreement FROM supplier_metrics WHERE delivery_time > 15
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating FROM supplier_metrics WHERE price_agreement >= 0.3 AND delivery_time <= 10 ORDER BY quality_rating DESC
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, price_agreement FROM supplier_metrics WHERE quality_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.5 ORDER BY price_agreement
SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_score, delivery_time FROM supplier_quality_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, delivery_rating, on_time_deliveries FROM supplier_delivery_metrics ORDER BY delivery_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM supplier_pricing_metrics WHERE discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_suppliers FROM supplier_pricing_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_score FROM supplier_quality_metrics ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, delivery_rating FROM supplier_delivery_metrics WHERE on_time_deliveries > late_deliveries;
SELECT supplier_id, pricing_agreement FROM supplier_quality_metrics WHERE quality_score > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_id, discount_rate FROM supplier_pricing_metrics WHERE discount_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY discount_rate DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM supplier_pricing_metrics WHERE contract_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, delivery_time FROM supplier_quality_metrics;
SELECT * FROM quality_ratings ORDER BY rating_name ASC;
SELECT agreement_name, agreement_value FROM pricing_agreements WHERE agreement_value > 100;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM supplier_quality_metrics JOIN delivery_times ON supplier_quality_metrics.supplier_id = delivery_times.delivery_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating FROM supplier_quality_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_metrics ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_status FROM delivery_times WHERE delivery_status='Delivered';

SELECT s.supplier_id, q.rating_name, p.agreement_value FROM supplier_quality_metrics s JOIN quality_ratings q ON s.quality_rating = q.rating_id JOIN pricing_agreements p ON s.pricing_agreement = p.agreement_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM supplier_details WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT metric_name, supplier_rating FROM quality_metrics ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_metrics WHERE on_time_delivery = true;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, supplier_location FROM supplier_details WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT quality_rating, delivery_time FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, pricing_agreement FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE quality_rating > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics INNER JOIN delivery_metrics ON quality_metrics.supplier_id = delivery_metrics.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_details ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
